description: This is actually Golf Course Cart Path.  In winter time, golf course is closed and anyone can enjoy snowshoing or cross country ski.  Once golf course is opened in May, we're not allowed to enter the cart path for any other reasons other than playing golf.  Golf course generally closes around November.
directions: VNCC Out 8 holes are located at West side of Dorset St in South Burlington. (After Exit-14E from I-89, turn right on Dorset St toward South.  After passing Swift St and South Burlington Water Tank, you'll see Vermont National Country Club House at right hand side.  My Trail shows VNCC In 6 out of 8 holes course (from #11 to #17) which is located at East side of Dorset St.
title: VNCC Path
